snippet: While many familiar spectacles are likely to be seen in Las Vegas this week during the International Consumer Electronics Show, one will be missing: stars of pornographic films.
abstract: While many familiar spectacles are likely to be seen in Las Vegas this week during the International Consumer Electronics Show, one will be missing: stars of pornographic films.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - Most of the familiar spectacles are likely to be on display here this week during the International Consumer Electronics Show: the acres of flat-screen televisions, the 140,000-or-so smartphone-packing attendees, the grim, never-ending taxicab lines. Something will be missing, though.

headline.main: Silicon and Silicone Split, as C.E.S. and Adult Entertainment Expo Part Ways
